holidays.title: International Youth Day
holidays.description: We focus on the difficulties that some young people are experiencing throughout the world.

holidays.title: National Bowling Day
holidays.description: Let's roll! The second Sunday in August means it's National Bowling Day.

holidays.title: Garage Sale Day
holidays.description: Did you know the best day to hold a garage sale is on a Saturday?

holidays.title: IBM PC Day
holidays.description: August 12, 1981 — the day IBM revolutionized the business world through its innovation.

holidays.title: Milkman Day
holidays.description: Let’s show love and appreciation for the people who work hard to deliver milk.

holidays.title: National Gooey Butter Cake Day
holidays.description: Prepare to savor a slice of gooey butter cake that will tempt your taste buds.

holidays.title: National Julienne Fries Day
holidays.description: Did you know the thin crispy fries we love to eat are known as julienne fries?

holidays.title: National Middle Child Day
holidays.description: Middle children may not always get the spotlight, so today we celebrate our oft-forgotten siblings.

holidays.title: National Vinyl Record Day
holidays.description: For those who value the quality of sound, vinyl records are here to stay.

holidays.title: Thailand Mother's Day
holidays.description: A mother is a child’s first best friend. This holiday, let’s show our love and appreciation.

holidays.title: The Glorious Twelfth
holidays.description: The Glorious Twelfth is a holiday celebrated in the United Kingdom on the 12th day of August.

holidays.title: World Elephant Day
holidays.description: We celebrate one of Earth’s most magnificent creatures with World Elephant Day.

holidays.title: Cara Delevingne’s Birthday
holidays.description: As the supermodel, actress, and eyebrow queen turns 29, here’s to charting more reasons to love her.

holidays.title: Dixie D'Amelio’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dixie has had a meteoric rise to fame, but she’s still only getting started!

holidays.title: Dream’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dream, the multi-talented “Minecraft” YouTuber and singer, worked his way to the top!

holidays.title: George Soros’s Birthday
holidays.description: The influence of George Soros — politics, power, and the struggle for an open society.

holidays.title: Hannah Berner’s Birthday
holidays.description: “Summer House's” Hannah Berner was a season three addition who rapidly became a fan favorite

holidays.title: Ken Walker’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ken is unbothered about what others think of him and prefers to follow his own path.

holidays.title: Marc Daly’s Birthday
holidays.description: Marc Daly is the husband of famous and feisty reality star Kenya Moore.

holidays.title: Rudy Pankow’s Birthday
holidays.description: The path to success is only beginning for this rising actor, Rudy Pankow!

holidays.title: Tyson Fury’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let us all raise a glass to this generation’s top heavyweight boxer.
